thread.title: Snub to wave: Ex-teammate’s epic troll after red
thread.title_full: Snub to wave: Ex-teammate’s epic troll after red

title: Snub to wave: Ex-teammate’s epic troll after red
text:
— FOX SPORTS Football (@FOXFOOTBALL) January 28, 2017 
Despite a Glory defender being between Reddy and his goal, the Perth keeper was shown a straight red card. 
As he left the pitch, Montgomery couldn’t resist waving goodbye to the departing player. 
“I’ve not got anything to comment on that,” Montgomery told Fox Sports after the match. 
“Maybe it's a red card maybe it’s not. 
“It’s disappointing for them [Glory] because he’s been great for them all season.” 
But it didn’t impact the result as the Mariners claimed a 2-0 victory over the Glory to win for the 13th ever time in Gosford. 
Here’s what you missed in Central Coast’s victory over Perth. The life of Liam Reddy 3:31 
A-League: Phil Moss dips into the life of goalkeeper Liam Reddy. January 28th 2017
